name: Hide back/forward in maximized window (FX 42+)
description: This userstyle hides back and forward buttons in a maximized Firefox window, meant to be used with extensions that provide alternative ways of using them, like MileWideBack or EdgeWise.

user.name: tulirebane
user.about: I no longer update my UI styles in this site, please check out my GitLab repo for the newest stuff!

additional_info:
My first userstyle!
